A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a movie\, the Last Jedi was entertaining to watch. As a Star Wars movie\, it was terrible.With seemingly no creative direction and lore breaking concepts\, I'm not sure how the franchise continues as an epic space opera with no solid structure to work from. If a new director can just come in and change the core aspects of the franchise that have been carried from film to film. What is the point of tying any of the films together? Something needs to be done in the third installment to turn this ship around\, because it's on a collision course with irrelevance.
